pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī saṃghena samanubhaṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.3: “saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.4: Santi saṃghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṃsaddā evaṃsilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā. Tā saṃgho na kiñci āha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.5: Tumhaññeva saṃgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha— ‘bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā. Viviccathāyye. Vivekaññeva bhaginīnaṃ saṃgho vaṇṇetī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.6: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.7: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā saṃghena samanubhaṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo evaṃ vakkhati—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.8: saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.11: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī saṃghena samanubhaṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.12: saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.13: Santi saṃghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṃsaddā evaṃsilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā. Tā saṃgho na kiñci āha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.14: Tumhaññeva saṃgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha— bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā. Viviccathāyye. Vivekaññeva bhaginīnaṃ saṃgho vaṇṇetī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.17: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī saṃghena samanubhaṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo evaṃ vakkhati—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.18: saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.22: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.24: ‘saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.25: Santi saṃghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṃsaddā evaṃsilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā. Tā saṃgho na kiñci āha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.26: Tumhaññeva saṃgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha— bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā. Viviccathāyye. Vivekaññeva bhaginīnaṃ saṃgho vaṇṇetī’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.29: saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.30: Santi saṃghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṃsaddā evaṃsilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā. Tā saṃgho na kiñci āha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.31: Tumhaññeva saṃgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha— bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā. Viviccathāyye. Vivekaññeva bhaginīnaṃ saṃgho vaṇṇetī’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.32: Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.33: Yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsīyamānā taṃ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ;
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.34: no ce paṭinissajjeyya, ayampi bhikkhunī yāvatatiyakaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṃghādisesan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.6: “saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.7: Santi saṃghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṃsaddā evaṃsilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā. Tā saṃgho na kiñci āha”.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.19: “bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.24: aññāhi bhikkhunīhi. Yā passanti yā suṇanti tāhi vattabbā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.26: ‘saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.36: ‘saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.48: $Santi saṃghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṃsaddā evaṃsilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.50: $Tumhaññeva saṃgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.51: $bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.55: $Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.58: Ayaṃ itthannāmā bhikkhunī saṃghena samanubhaṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.61: Santi saṃghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṃsaddā evaṃsilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.63: Tumhaññeva saṃgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.64: bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.68: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.72: $Santi saṃghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṃsaddā evaṃsilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.74: $Tumhaññeva saṃgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.75: $bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.79: $Saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.80: $Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, sā tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.83: Ayaṃ itthannāmā bhikkhunī saṃghena samanubhaṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.86: Santi saṃghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṃsaddā evaṃsilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.88: Tumhaññeva saṃgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.89: bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṃghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.93: Saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.94: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, sā tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.98: Samanubhaṭṭhā saṃghena itthannāmā bhikkhunī tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.99: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.103: Saṃghādisesaṃ ajjhāpajjantiyā ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ, dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā paṭippassambhanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.111: saṃghova tassā āpattiyā mānattaṃ deti, mūlāya paṭikassati, abbheti, na sambahulā na ekā bhikkhunī. Tena vuccati “saṃghādiseso”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.112: Tasseva āpattinikāyassa nāmakammaṃ adhivacanaṃ, tenapi vuccati “saṃghādiseso”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.113: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.114: Dhammakamme vematikā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.115: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.126: Uddiṭṭhā kho, ayyāyo, sattarasa saṃghādisesā dhammā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.128: Yesaṃ bhikkhunī aññataraṃ vā aññataraṃ vā āpajjati, tāya bhikkhuniyā ubhatosaṃghe pakkhamānattaṃ caritabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.129: Ciṇṇamānattā bhikkhunī yattha siyā vīsatigaṇo bhikkhunisaṃgho tattha sā bhikkhunī abbhetabbā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.130: Ekāyapi ce ūno vīsatigaṇo bhikkhunisaṃgho taṃ bhikkhuniṃ abbheyya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.131: Sā ca bhikkhunī anabbhitā, tā ca bhikkhuniyo gārayhā, ayaṃ tattha sāmīci.
